title: AI is no longer a technology story. It's an evolving human story
description: Artificial intelligence is no longer a speculative technology story. It is now a macro story playing out in the real world. And the world's sharpest minds cannot agree on what happens next: gloom or bloom?
content:
The jobs that were supposed to be safe aren't. The timeline that felt distant doesn't anymore. The world is in the grip of fear, uncertainty and anxiety, with just a sliver of hope.

title: Study: People are overconfident they can tell AI-made faces from real
description: As artificial intelligence-fuelled scams and fraud become increasingly prevalent, most people remain far too confident of their ability to spot a fake face, going by Australian research that asked people to say if photos were real or AI-generated.
content: SYDNEY: As artificial intelligence-fuelled scams and fraud become increasingly prevalent, most people remain far too confident of their ability to spot a fake face, going by Australian research that asked people to say if photos were real or AI-gener... [1892 chars]

title: "We Don't Need It": Trump Orders Federal Agencies To Halt Use Of Anthropic
description: President Donald Trump said Friday that he was ordering all federal agencies to stop using Anthropic's technology following the company's unusually public dispute with the Pentagon over artificial intelligence safety.
content:

description: The Trump administration has ordered all US agencies to stop using Anthropic's artificial intelligence technology and imposed other major penalties, culminating an unusually public clash between the government and the company over AI safeguards.
content:

title: Trump orders US agencies to stop using Anthropic technology in clash over AI safety
description: The Trump administration has ordered all U.S. government agencies to stop using artificial intelligence technology from Anthropic and imposed penalties on the company after a dispute over military access to its AI tools.
